articles.title: How a banned encryption chip is stopping China from running Windows 11, for now - AsiaOne
articles.description: China banned foreign TPM chips as far back as 1999 over national security concerns, and has adopted a home-grown equivalent amid clashes with US over tech standards.

articles.title: Duterte admin approval rating in fight vs corruption drops 12 points in latest survey - CNN Philippines
articles.description: The Duterte administration’s approval rating in addressing graft and corruption had a double-digit drop of 12 points to 52% based on Pulse Asia’s latest poll.
